TemporalDirections.TEXT: ,Character,Dialogue,EpisodeNo,SEID,Season 52550,GEORGE,"Well, if she keeps horsing around with that tractor--",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52551,JERRY,Alright. So how's the two-man operation at Kruger?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52552,GEORGE,"Two-man? It's all me. Kruger doesn't do anything; Disappears for hours at a time, gives me fake excuses. This afternoon I found him with sleep creases on his face. The only reason I got out to get a bite today was that he finally promised to buckle down and do some actual work. (turning around, George sees Mr. Kruger at a booth eating a piece of cake) Oh, I don't believe this. This is what I have to put up with, Jerry. (He walks over) Mr. Kruger? Who said he was going to do some actual work today? Who?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52553,KRUGER,I'm not too worried about it.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52554,GEORGE,Well I am. Couldn't you try to go through some of that stuff I put in your shoebox?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52555,KRUGER,"Alright, alright I'm going.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52556,GEORGE,(to Jerry) Huh-ho! Have you ever seen anything like this?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52557,JERRY,Never.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52558,PUDDY,"Elaine, they forgot to deliver your paper today. Why don't you just grab that one.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52559,ELAINE,"'Cause that belongs to Mr. Potato Guy, that's his.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52560,PUDDY,"C'mon, get it.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52561,ELAINE,"Well if you want it, you get it.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52562,PUDDY,"Sorry, thou shalt not steal.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52563,ELAINE,"Oh, but it's ok for me?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52564,PUDDY,"What do you care, you know where you're going.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52565,ELAINE,"Alright, that is it! I can't live like this.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52566,PUDDY,Nah.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52567,ELAINE,C'mon.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52568,PUDDY,"Alright, what did I do?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52569,ELAINE,"David, I'm going to hell! The worst place in the world! With devils and those caves and the ragged clothing! And the heat! My god, the heat! I mean, what do you think about all that?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52570,PUDDY,Gonna be rough.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52571,ELAINE,"Uh, you should be trying to save me!",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52572,PUDDY,Don't boss me! This is why you're going to hell.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52573,ELAINE,"I am not going to hell and if you think I'm going to hell, you should care that I'm going to hell even though I am not.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52574,PUDDY,"You stole my Jesus fish, didn't you?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52575,ELAINE,"Yeah, that's right!",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52576,MICKEY,"Oh, my liver! Why did I drink all those years? Why did I look for love in a bottle?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52577,DR. WEXLER,Mr. Kramer? You're up.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52578,MICKEY,"Wait a minute. You are doing gonorrhea, aren't you?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52579,KRAMER,"Well, we'll see.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52580,STUDENT #2,"So, what seems to be bothering you today, Mr. Kramer?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52581,KRAMER,"(pulling a liquor bottle from his jacket pocket) Well, I guess it started about twenty years ago when I got back from Viet Nam, and this was the only friend I had left.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52582,MICKEY,Hey! That's my cirrhosis! He's stealing my cirrhosis! (he jumps Kramer) You wanna be sick? I'll make you sick.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52583,STUDENT #2,Cirrhosis of the liver and PCP addiction?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52584,FATHER CURTIS,Let me see if I understand this. You're concerned that he isn't concerned that you're going to hell. And you feel that she's too bossy.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52585,ELAINE & PUDDY,"Yeah, that's right.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52586,FATHER CURTIS,"Well, oftentimes in cases of inter-faith marriages, couples have difficulty--",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52587,FATHER CURTIS,You aren't?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52588,PUDDY,No.,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52589,ELAINE,"We're just, you know, having a good time.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52590,FATHER CURTIS,"Oh, well then it's simple. You're both going to hell.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52591,PUDDY,"No way, this is bogus, man!",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52592,ELAINE,"Well, thank you father.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52593,FATHER CURTIS,"Oh, did you hear the one about the new guy in hell who's talkng to the devil by the coffee machine?",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52594,PUDDY,"I'm really not in the mood, I'm going to hell.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52595,ELAINE,"Oh, lighten up. It'll only feel like an eternity.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52596,SOPHIE,"You know, Jerry, there's this thing that I haven't told you about. See, there was this tractor and, oh boy, this is really difficult.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52597,JERRY,"Sophie, it's me. I know about the tractor story and I'm fine with it.",16.0,S09E16,9.0 52598,SOPHIE,How could you know?,16.0,S09E16,9.0 52599,JERRY,"(putting his finger to Sophie's lips, then to his own, then back to Sopie's) Shh. Shh. Shh. It's not important. What's important is I'm not gonna let a little thing like that ruin what could be a very long-term and meaningful relationship.",16.0,S09E16,9.0

DIRECTION.text: pulling a liquor bottle from his jacket pocket
putting his finger to Sophie's lips, then to his own, then back to Sopie's

DIALOGUE.text: Huh-ho! Have you ever seen anything like this?
Well, I guess it started about twenty years ago when I got back from Viet Nam, and this was the only friend I had left.
You wanna be sick? I'll make you sick.

RELATION.toText: Huh-ho! Have you ever seen anything like this?

RELATION.fromText: pulling a liquor bottle from his jacket pocket

You wanna be sick? I'll make you sick.
